newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Grain down 4.5 pct on profit prospects.
newsitem.headline: Grain down 4.5 pct on profit prospects.

text.p: Ceylon Grain Elevators Ltd fell 4.5 percent, or 50 cents, to 10.50 rupees in early selling on Wednesday, brokers said.
"Profits for the nine months to September 30 which are due shortly, are not expected to be good," a local broker said.
The company, which mills animal feed and produces day-old chicks, has suffered from rising world food grain prices and power cuts in the first half of 1996, the broker said.
A drop in tourism and increased competition has put further strains on the earnings, he said.
